title: Tap tech for border roads: Rajnath Singh to BRO, cites Chinese infra across LAC - Hindustan Times
content: Tap tech for border roads: Rajnath Singh to BRO, cites Chinese infra across LAC  Hindustan Times
description: Defence minister Rajnath Singh said the Chinese manage to reach different places very quickly due to their proficiency in construction in mountainous areas and asked Border Roads Organisation to increase its capability with full use of technology.
